body:
This is failing on CircleCI due to some eslint issues:

```
  4:1   error  'components' should be listed in the project's dependencies. Run 'npm i -S components' to add it  import/no-extraneous-dependencies
  4:36  error  Unable to resolve path to module 'components/RecipeContainer'         
```

This is solved with an update to the `.eslintrc` file, included in this PR. It seems as if Circle is using an outdated eslint file or something. You can reproduce the error locally by removing the `settings:importer/resolver` section of .eslintrc and running `npm run lint`.

Is there something we need to do to update Circle's eslint checks? @Osmose @mythmon
